title: Student-Led Digital Learning Environment Design Project: ICT Module

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT utilization skills, understanding of fundamental theories in science, and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: A course for graduate students or job seekers to enhance competencies in LMS (Learning Management System) comparative analysis and digital instructional design, combining offline classes with digital device-based practical training

learning_goals: Learners can analyze functional differences between MoodleCloud and Google Classroom and select a platform aligned with educational objectives
Learners can design virtual classrooms for science disciplines across two platforms using the student-designer approach
Learners can collaboratively develop a systematic framework to evaluate LMS usability, customization, and collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
